home-description: Hello, I'm Muhammad Ardiansyah Firdaus, a passionate web developer with experience in creating responsive and engaging web applications. I am an expert in using technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Next JS, Type Script, Tailwind, etc. I believe that good design is the key to a great user experience.
about-developer: A Web Development based in Indonesia
about-me: Muhammad Ardiansyah Firdaus is a 4th semester student of the Department of Informatics Engineering at the University of Muhammadiyah Bandung. I have a great interest in the world of technology, especially as a web and mobile developer. As a web developer from Indonesia, I have expertise in HTML, CSS (mainly using Tailwind CSS), JavaScript, React JS, and Next JS. I always try to keep learning and developing my abilities in this field.
skills-description: My skills in Programming and the tools I use
projects-description: The project project I worked on from the beginning
projects-1: The Campus Forum is an interactive platform where students can share ideas, discuss various academic topics, and develop professional networks.
projects-2: Mafwork is a web that allows you to create Classes, collect Assignments, play Quizzes, and take Exams easily and efficiently.
projects-3: Mafstore is a marketplace website that sells various kinds of our needs, where the Mafstore website has been built using API access tokens and Google Providers.
